subject: RE: [junit] TestCase Dependency Hierarchy
msgSnippet: ... previous ... I was feeling that, and I was trying so hard to be level and not provoke it. I think I ll go to my grave unable to master communicating w/o
messageBody:
> I hope that you don't feel that everyone's contentious, there is a
> spirit of the free exchange of ideas. (I'm referring to your
previous
> post.)

I was feeling that, and I was trying so hard to be level and not provoke it.
I think I'll go to my grave unable to master communicating w/o ambiguity.

> By the way what language are you working in?

Not quite sure of the question, but a fun answer .... Usually Java. English
is my second language and I am poor at it. ;-) ;-)

regards

Adam
